jobDescription: Location:Baltimore/Washington D.C.CategoryCustomer Service & Technical Support, Engineering, Manufacturing & ProductionDivisionIntraloxHoursDaysApply nowIntralox, L.L.C., a division of Laitram, LLC, the world leader in conveyor equipment solutions utilizing modular plastic conveyor belts, has a position available for a Mechanical/ Electrical Field Service Technician.
